mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER( member_no, member_address, member_method, member_level, member_password, member_name, member_phone, member_birth, member_zipcode, member_email, member_date ,member_address_detail ) VALUES ( #{member_no},#{member_address},'이메일' ,0,#{member_password},#{member_name},#{member_phone} ,#{member_birth},#{member_zipcode},#{member_email} ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') ,#{member_address_detail} )

INSERT INTO TB_POINT(point_no, member_point, point_date, point_used_saved, member_no, point_type) VALUES (SEQ_TB_MEMBER_POINT_NO.NEXTVAL, 2000 ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS'),0,#{member_no},0)
mapper.select: SELECT NVL((SELECT /*+index_desc(TB_MEMBER PK_TB_MEMBER)*/ member_no FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE rownum = 1),0)+1 member_no FROM dual
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_member SET member_address =#{member_address}, member_zipcode =#{member_zipcode}, member_password =#{member_password}, member_name =#{member_name}, member_phone =#{member_phone}, member_birth =#{member_birth} WHERE member_no =#{member_no}
